allow: Bash(zsh -i -c "micromamba install -n base -c conda-forge streamlit requests -y")
Bash(zsh -i -c "micromamba run -n base pip install sseclient-py")
Bash(zsh -i -c "micromamba activate base && python -m pip install sseclient-py streamlit requests")
Bash(zsh -i -c "micromamba activate base && which python3 && python3 -m pip install sseclient-py streamlit requests")
